JUDGES: Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national who was born in DATE and is currently detained in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the NORP authorities issued an arrest warrant against the applicant . According to the information given by the ORG office in GPE to the ORG office in GPE , he was charged with fraud .

In DATE the applicant crossed the border into GPE illegally and was caught by the NORP security forces in possession of a forged passport . He was subsequently detained on remand . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of forgery of official documents and sentenced him to DATE and CARDINAL months’ imprisonment .

On an unspecified date , extradition proceedings were brought before ORG . Before the court , the applicant and his lawyer maintained that the applicant was charged with political offences in GPE and that a decision had been taken to execute the applicant , a decision which had been published in the NORP Official Gazette of DATE . They thus contended that , if returned to GPE , the applicant would be executed .

On DATE ORG decided to extradite the applicant to GPE . In its judgment , the court noted that the applicant was charged with fraudulent acts , forgery and bribery in GPE , and that the offences with which the applicant was charged in GPE were not of a political or military nature . The assize court found that there were no circumstances hindering the extradition of the applicant according to LAW no . DATE .
The applicant appealed against this decision .

On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of the first - instance court holding , inter alia , that the latter had failed to examine the applicant ’s claim that he would be subjected to torture and executed if returned to GPE .
On DATE ORG decided not to extradite the applicant to GPE , in the light of ORG decision . This judgment became final on DATE .
In the meantime , the applicant requested asylum from the national authorities .
On DATE ORG rejected his request .
On an unspecified date the applicant brought proceedings before ORG for the annulment of the ORG ’s decision .
On DATE the administrative court annulled the decision , holding that the administration had failed to examine the applicant ’s claim that he would be at risk if deported to GPE .
The proceedings are currently pending before ORG .
On an unspecified date the applicant was released .
On DATE the applicant was issued a temporary residence permit valid for DATE .
